title: View Preferences
description: Customize how books are displayed in your library, including grid layout, sorting options, and sidebar behavior.

librarySort.sectionTitle: Library and Shelf View & Sort Preferences
librarySort.sectionDesc: Configure default and per-library/shelf preferences for sorting and view mode (grid or table) in the browser.
librarySort.defaultPreferencesDesc: Configure the default view mode and multi-field sorting for all libraries and shelves. Drag to reorder sort priority.
librarySort.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save changes when navigating to the next or previous book in the metadata editor.
librarySort.overrideManagementDesc: Add custom preferences for specific libraries or shelves. These will override your default settings.
librarySort.saveSuccessDetail: Your sorting and view preferences were saved successfully.
librarySort.visibleSortFieldsDesc: Choose which sort fields appear in the book browser's sort dropdown and drag to reorder.

filter.sectionDesc: Configure default options for filter controls shown in the sidebar.
filter.filterModeDesc: Choose the default mode for combining filters selected from the right filter sidebar.
filter.visibleFiltersDesc: Choose which filters appear in the sidebar and drag to reorder. Between {{min}} and {{max}} filters.

sidebarSort.sectionTitle: Sidebar Library and Shelf Sorting Preference
sidebarSort.sectionDesc: Configure sorting options for your library and shelves names shown in the left menu sidebar.
sidebarSort.libraryDesc: Choose how library names are sorted and displayed in the sidebar.
sidebarSort.shelfDesc: Choose how shelf names are sorted and displayed in the sidebar.
sidebarSort.magicShelfDesc: Choose how magic shelf names are sorted and displayed in the sidebar.
sidebarSort.prefsUpdatedDetail: Your preferences have been saved successfully.

metaCenter.sectionDesc: Customize how you view metadata and series information.
metaCenter.displayModeDesc: Choose whether to open the Metadata Center in the current page or as a popup dialog window.
metaCenter.seriesViewModeDesc: Enable or disable the series view mode for displaying series information.
metaCenter.metaCenterSaved: Your metadata center view preference has been saved.
metaCenter.seriesViewSaved: Your series view mode preference has been saved.
